Walkot Hendi Sebut Alste Berkontribusi Memajukan Kota Semarang
03 Nov 2019, 19:46 by Alfi Kholisdinuka
Jakarta - Wali kota Semarang Hendrar Prihadi menghadiri talkshow dan Munas Alste Indonesia (Alumni SMA Negeri 3 Semarang). Menurutnya, sekolah ini telah menjadi kebanggaan tersendiri bagi Kota Semarang karena telah melahirkan pemuda-pemudi yang membanggakan bangsa yang tersebar di tingkat nasional maupun internasional.
"Ini menjadi tonggak lahirnya sebuah sejarah perkembangan kualitas NKRI khususnya Kota Semarang karena alumni Alste ada di tataran elite Indonesia. Mulai dari Kepolisian, TNI, perbankan, hingga berada di antara deretan menteri dalam kabinet seperti Sri Mulyani sebagai Menteri Keuangan, serta Retno Marsudi sebagai Menteri Luar Negeri," ujar Hendi dalam keterangan tertulis, Minggu (3/11/2019.
Hendi mengatakan pada 1 November 2019 kemarin genap SMA 3 berusia 142 tahun, yang semula bernama SMA Bodjong pada tanggal 1 November 1877. Ia menegaskan bahwa Kota Semarang bangga menjadi bagian dari berdirinya SMA 3 yang telah melahirkan lulusan yang berkualitas.
Seperti saat terbakarnya pasar Johar di tahun 2015, pemerintah tentu perlu mempertimbangkan revitalisasi kawasan ikon Kota Semarang tersebut mengingat biaya yang harus digelontorkan sebesar Rp 720 miliar. Namun karena bantuan dari Menteri Keuangan, Sri Mulyani pasar Johar dapat dibangun kembali melalui APBN.
Tak hanya itu, Retno Marsudi yang aktif dalam komunikasi diplomatik antara Indonesia dan Belanda saat menjadi Duta Besar Indonesia untuk Belanda berhasil mendorong Pemerintah Kerajaan Belanda untuk mau ikut berpartisipasi dalam upaya penanggulangan rob dan banjir di Kota Semarang, melalui program kaki kering. Dari semula kawasan banjir diangka 41 persen, kini berkurang menjadi 12%.
Begitu pula seperti yang dilakukan Kukrit Suryo Wicaksono selaku Ketua Kadin Jawa Tengah yang tak hanya turut meningkatkan perekonomian dan pembangunan, beliau juga berhasil mengajak para investor untuk berinvestasi di Kota Semarang.
Statistik menunjukkan di tahun 2010 nilai investasi hanya Rp 1 triliun, namun pada 3 tahun terakhir nilai investasi di Kota Semarang ada di angka Rp 20 triliun ke atas bahkan di tahun 2019 diperkirakan tembus hingga Rp 30 triliun.
"Ini menunjukkan bahwa SMA 3 telah menjadi bagian saudara, sahabat, serta mitra yang tidak bisa terpisahkan atas kemajuan Kota Semarang. Harapannya ke depan para alumni dapat terus bersinergi dan berkolaborasi dengan Pemerintah Kota demi tercapainya kemajuan kota kita tercinta ini," tandas Hendi.

Walkot Hendi Said Alste Contributed to Advancing the City of Semarang
03 Nov 2019, 19:46 by Alfi Kholisdinuka
Jakarta - Semarang mayor Hendrar Prihadi attended the talkshow and Alste Indonesia National Conference (Alumni of SMA Negeri 3 Semarang). According to him, this school has become a matter of pride for the city of Semarang because it has given birth to young people who boast of a nation that is spread nationally and internationally.
"This is a milestone in the birth of a history of the development of the quality of the Republic of Indonesia, especially in the city of Semarang, because Alste alumni are at the level of the Indonesian elite. Starting from the police, military, banking, to being among rows of ministers in the cabinet such as Sri Mulyani as Minister of Finance, and Retno Marsudi as Minister Overseas, "said Hendi in a written statement, Sunday (11/03/2019).
Hendi said that on November 1, 2019 yesterday was even 142 years old SMA 3, which was originally named Bodjong High School on November 1, 1877. He stressed that Semarang City was proud to be part of the founding of SMA 3 which had produced quality graduates.
Like when the Johar market was set on fire in 2015, the government certainly needs to consider revitalizing the iconic area of the city of Semarang given the costs that had to be disbursed amounting to Rp 720 billion. However, due to assistance from the Minister of Finance, Sri Mulyani Johar market could be rebuilt through the state budget.
Not only that, Retno Marsudi who was active in diplomatic communication between Indonesia and the Netherlands when she was the Indonesian Ambassador to the Netherlands succeeded in encouraging the Government of the Kingdom of the Netherlands to participate in efforts to combat tidal and flooding in the city of Semarang, through the dry leg program. From the beginning the flood area was 41 percent, now it has been reduced to 12%.
Similarly, as did Kukrit Suryo Wicaksono as Chairman of the Central Java Chamber of Commerce who not only helped improve the economy and development, he also managed to invite investors to invest in the city of Semarang.
Statistics show that in 2010 the investment value was only IDR 1 trillion, but in the last 3 years the investment value in Semarang City was in the amount of IDR 20 trillion and above, even in 2019 it is estimated to reach IDR 30 trillion.
"This shows that SMA 3 has become a part of relatives, friends, and partners who cannot be separated from the progress of the City of Semarang. Hopefully in the future the alumni can continue to synergize and collaborate with the City Government to achieve the progress of our beloved city," said Hendi.
